address: Phường Vĩnh Mỹ, Thành phố Châu Đốc, Tỉnh An Giang
thought:
**My Analysis of Address Mapping for "Phường Vĩnh Mỹ, Thành phố Châu Đốc, Tỉnh An Giang"**

Okay, so I've been tasked with mapping this old address to its new administrative unit, and here's my line of thought: first, I need to dissect the old address. I see "Phường Vĩnh Mỹ," which tells me the ward, "Thành phố Châu Đốc," the district (though we are meant to eliminate districts, it's still part of the old address structure), and "Tỉnh An Giang," the province.

Now, I'll consult the province resolutions, specifically checking for An Giang. Resolution 60-NQ/TW doesn't indicate any province-level changes, so "Tỉnh An Giang" remains as it is.

Next, the crucial step: I'll delve into the other resolutions, focusing on "Phường Vĩnh Mỹ" within An Giang. Bingo! Resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my attention immediately. It clearly states the arrangement of administrative units in An Giang. Line 83 within this resolution is key. It outlines the merger of "Vĩnh Mỹ" (among other wards) into a new ward called "Phường Châu Đốc." I'm pretty confident this is the match.

I've also scanned other resolutions, like 1655 and 1675. They are for Cà Mau and Huế, respectively. Those resolutions are irrelevant for this address.

Now, I turn to the "New wards" list. I'm searching for "Phường Châu Đốc" within An Giang. And there it is: `{"ward_code":"30316","ward_name":"Phường Châu Đốc","province_name":"Tỉnh An Giang"}`. Perfect match!

So, the new ward is "Phường Châu Đốc" with ward code "30316" in "Tỉnh An Giang." This is based on resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 83. My confidence level here is high because the mapping is direct and unambiguous.

Regarding the prompt requesting "all possible new ward candidates," given the specificity of the information and the clear mapping provided by 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, I believe "Phường Châu Đốc" is the only and most accurate match for "Phường Vĩnh Mỹ."

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 83. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Vĩnh Nguơn, Châu Phú A, Châu Phú B, Vĩnh Mỹ và một phần diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Vĩnh Châu thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Châu Đốc.
